reviewText: This is not a dramatic enactment. Primarily it's Mr. Heston reading Scripture relating directly to The Passion of our Lord. There are only four DVDs in the series -- would have been nice to have the WHOLE Bible. It's recorded on location with a majestic presentation by Mr. Heston.

Charlton Heston is the greatest actor the world has ever known.  I can think of no better qualified person to have done this project than him.
This should be required viewing by all elementary through high school students.
